channel.title: Digital Zoo Keepers
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Digital Zoo Keepers

item.title: Class types
item.description: public class test : MonoBehaviour The class is accessible from any other class or assembly. private class test : MonoBehaviour​ The class is accessible only within its containing class.

item.title: Week 11 Unity
item.description: Code section explained: Namespace Declarations No not change this part This part is to include functions from other libraries. What is Namespaces? using System.Collections; using System.Collections.Generic; using UnityEngine; Main script Start with defining variables.

item.title: Week 11 Unity Installation
item.description: Step 1: Install Unity Hub Go to unity.com/download, find Download for Windows This will initial downloading of Unity Hub. Step 2: Install Unity Editor Inside Unity Hub, go to installs find and download the latest Long Term Support (LTS) version: LTS Release2022.3.29f1 Warning Microsoft Visual Studio as a component is required for this session.

item.title: Life Cycle Assessment
item.description: Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) is a systematic method used to evaluate the environmental impacts associated with all stages of a product’s life cycle, from raw material extraction ...

item.title: Building Information Modelling
item.description: Building Information Modelling (BIM) is a digital representation of the physical and functional characteristics of a facility. It is a collaborative process that allows architects, engineers, and construction professionals to design, construct, and manage buildings and infrastructure projects more efficiently.
